alert.note: Alert for Grant (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 04 at 9:51PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Grant County through 1015 PM CDT... At 951 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Fennimore, or 11 miles north of Lancaster, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Fennimore, Muscoda, Preston, Centerville, Orion, Mount Ida, Blue River, Highway 61 And County T, Red Oak Ridge, Port Andrew and Stitzer. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for southwestern Wisconsin.
